name: Displaybank
overview:
Displaybank offers an extensive range of information that includes analysis of LCD, PDP products for end-users, panels, modules, and a variety of display components. The company has also been expanding its business into sectors that include next-generation displays such as OLED and flexible displays.

Through the distribution of daily reports, consultations, and a competitive website, Displaybank is offering diverse forms of information on the market. The company’s website (available in Korean/English/ Japanese/Chinese) allows you to experience the analysis of the world’s fastest and in-depth market trends.

Displaybank has managed international conferences all over the world, such as the Korea Display Conference (KDC), with the aim of strengthening the presence of the display industry and developing its future with the major players in the industry. In respective locations where conferences are held, participants and attendees have expressed a vast amount of interest, adding weight to the conferences every year.
